<set-variable name="paymentToken" value="@{
		// Setting payment token value with default value
		var paymentToken = "";
		// Extracting required field from request body
		XElement request = context.Request.Body.As(preserveContent: true);
		XElement body = request.Descendants(request.Name.Namespace + "Body").FirstOrDefault();
		if (body != null ) {
			XElement primitive = (XElement) body.FirstNode;
			paymentToken = primitive.Descendants("paymentToken").FirstOrDefault().Value;
		}
		return paymentToken;
	}" />

	
	<set-variable name="nodo_paymentToken_key" value="@{
		var domain = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("domain", "nodo");
		var paymentToken = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("paymentToken", "");
		return domain + "_" + paymentToken;
	}" />
	<cache-lookup-value key="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("nodo_paymentToken_key", "NONE"))" variable-name="nodo_paymentToken" default-value="NONE" caching-type="external" />

	

		
		<when condition="@(!context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("nodo_paymentToken", "NONE").Equals("NONE"))">
			<set-variable name="baseNodeId" value="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("nodo_paymentToken", "NONE"))" />
